fields.Title: Zero
fields.author: Rocicorp
fields.description: Zero is a new kind of sync engine powered by queries. Rather than syncing entire tables, you write queries directly in your client code that can access the entire backend database. Zero caches query data locally and reuses it automatically, making almost all queries instant while falling back to the server when needed.

fields.Title: ElectricSQL

fields.description: Sync little subsets of your Postgres data into local apps and services.

fields.Title: Tweek

fields.description: Tweek is a FREE personal and shared to do list app to organize your tasks and collaborate on them online with your team or family. It provides a weekly calendar view mode and a reminder app. Tweek is an online daily and weekly planner that boosts your productivity to the best level. Instantly plan and organize your week todos!

fields.description: Sync engine for building local-first apps with instantly-responsive UI/UX and simplified state transfer. Connects to Postgres, MongoDB and MySQL backend databases.

fields.Title: NextGraph
fields.author: Niko Bonnieure
fields.description: Features a social network, shared documents, productivity tools, an app store, and more! You can use NextGraph for free. It is decentralized, resilient, secure, private and encrypted. You own your data and software! Developers can build new web3.0 local-first apps with our open source framework, based on open standards, with CRDTs, E2EE, Semantic Web, RDF, SPARQL, JSON, Markdown, Svelte, React, JavaScript, Rust, etc... ActivityPub and Solid compatible
